Sci-Fi: The Earth disappears from orbit, but no one notices.
Aliens land — and ask to speak to your cat.
Romance: Two enemies fall in love during a ceasefire.
They fall for each other in a dream... every night.
Horror: You find your own name in an ancient prophecy.
The forest never ends, and you're walking in circles.
Poetry: Write about the feeling of falling — without using the word fall.
Describe a heartbeat as a thunderstorm.
